message: Thanks for attending the Analyse This workshop. You can find the code sample at https://github.com/K-DAG/analyzeThis

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.

If you are an aspiring data analyst, we invite you to join us tomorrow at SN Bose Auditorium from 6 - 7 p.m. We will solve the problem statement of Analyze This and help you with your first submission. We will guide you through the basics of data pre-processing, feature engineering, model deployment and testing. Bring your laptops with ipython notebook installed.
If you like machine learning and free pizzas do come to V4, Vikramshilla. We are waiting for you !

story: Kharagpur Data Analytics Group updated their cover photo.
Kharagpur Data Analytics Group updated their cover photo.

message:
Are you passionate about data science and applied mathematics? Did you feel that even though math was your strongest suit growing up, it was only an academic science and not applicable in real life situations? 
All that has changed with the advent of data science and computing. And financial markets are one of the best places to learn and apply these skills.
P.S. : Look forward to lots of goodies and T-shirts
Date: 06:30PM
Time: 28-02-2017
Veunu: V-4 VIkramshilla Complex, IIT Kharagpur

message:
Team “devenish-IIT-Kharagpur” ( Siddharth Muthukumar, Mohit Pokharna, Abhinav Agarwalla, Ishaan Sang) from IIT Kharagpur has made it into the top 20 finalists of Data Science Game 2016. They are representing India in the final round at Paris and will now be competing against Cambridge, Columbia, Stanford and other universites on 10th September. 
We congratulate and wish the best of luck to the team devenish-IIT-Kharagpur on behalf of K-DAG.

Data Science Game

https://www.facebook.com/datasciencegame/?fref=nf
